item.title: What is this fruit? Deep learning application for Vietnamese fruit recognition.
item.author: mateusz.baryla.1996@gmail.com (Mateusz Bary≈Ça)
item.description: In April 2018 I deployed first deep learning application to production. This app was a group project during the subject called Introduction to Artificial Intelligence conducted in Asia, at Ton Duc Thang University in Vietnam. I was one of first two students that represented Wroc≈Çaw University of Science and Technology in Asia. It was a great opportunity to learn how to relate with other people in international environment. I also deepened my understanding of AI building from scratch web application in python, HTML and CSS.

item.title: Bio
item.author: mateusz.baryla.1996@gmail.com (Mateusz Bary≈Ça)
item.description: Hello üôã My name is Mateusz and I have nearly four years of professional experience. I was working in management consulting, startup and in Fortune 500 company. Considering these experiences I have developed my communication and analytical skills. As a part of multiple international projects, I have dived into complex data sets and delivered comprehensive analyses for the world’s largest companies. Being a student in two fields of studies, Applied Mathematics and Computer Science has given me exceptional opportunities to gain mainly technical engineering knowledge.

item.title: Links
item.author: mateusz.baryla.1996@gmail.com (Mateusz Bary≈Ça)
item.description: In this section I’ve listed a set of tools that I use on a daily basis while working on data science problems. Gathering requirements Jira Data preprocessing pandas tidyr NumPy Exploratory Data Analysis seaborn Sweetviz ggplot matplotlib ydata-profiling Feature engineering & selection scikit-learn pandas tidyverse Modelling LightGBM Optuna MLflow H2O XGBoost tidymodels prophet statsmodels scikit-learn Explainability SHAP InterpretML Recommendations & presentations PowerPoint Confluence Google Slides MLOps kedro GitHub Bitbucket Jenkins GitLab IDE Jupyter Notebook Data Spell Visual Studio Code
